name: Protected Content Packages For WooCommerce
author: Amin Y

sections.description:
Content Selling in Woocommerce plugin
Protect and sell your training materials, videos, pdf tutorials within pages, posts and other custom post type pages by associating them with Woocommerce products.
The customer buying the product gets access to the associated protected contents (for specified number of days).
This can be used to sell video tutorials, pdf contents and other digital data as products.

Sell Pages, Digital contents, Video access, Manuals for products

  • Option Available under Woocommerce Settings Tab
  • Add multiple of these as packs and link with a Woocommerce product with a price
  • Each access packs can protect multiple pages, posts or posts under a custom post type
  • Supports protecting ACF field contents linked to pages and Posts/custom post type
  • With validaity of specific number of days from the date of purchase.

How to use the Plugin?

Download, Install and Activate the plugin.

Plugin Settings available under Woocommerce->Settings->Protected Content Packages.

Create one or more required “packages” associate any existing woocommerce product and multiple pages, posts or custom post types.

Edit the pages/posts/custom post type to be protected and mark those as “Protected”, so those cant be accessed or viewed without access.

When those products are purchased, the “Completed order” email will have links to access the protected pages/posts.Those links can also be accessed from the MyAccount->order details page.

Feedback

  • We are open to your suggestions and feedback. Thank you for using or trying out one of our plugins!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire plugin folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the “Plugins” menu in WordPress.
  3. Start by visiting plugin settings at “WooCommerce > Settings > Agree me checkboxes”.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

This is the first release of the plugin.
